item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Job Inquires Job related inquires can be made on LinkedIn. Open Source Work Questions related to open source work should be made on GitHub.

item.title: Bio
item.description: Bio I am a Principal Site Reliability Engineer currently working at Red Hat helping build and deploy reliable, secure, and scalable managed services on top of Managed OpenShift. Work Experience Red Hat Inc. Principal Site Reliability Engineer (Apr 2025 - Present) Leading a global SRE team deploying and running managed offerings on top of OpenShift. Prototyped a new business model for managed offerings on top of OpenShift Senior Site Reliability Engineer (Oct 2022 - Apr 2025) Led a global SRE team deploying and running managed offerings on top of OpenShift.
